message:
Respectfully disagree; it is possible that your response will be sent and then no email or log will ever be generated. Unlikely, but possible.  

AspNetBackgroundTasks is essentially a ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem that registers the task with the ASP.NET runtime, so it is safer; it reduces the chance of a lost email/log even further. But it's still not guaranteed; the only guaranteed solution is reliable storage.
